english: Clara was full of a sombre preconception .
chinese: 克拉拉心中充满了模糊的成见。

english: But we see it only as a hazy blur .
chinese: 但我们看到的只是模糊的斑点。

english: He took off his foggy glasses and dried his face .
chinese: 他把模糊的眼镜摘下来后把脸擦干。

english: He presented only a confused and clouded argument .
chinese: 他提出的只是一种混乱而模糊的立论。

english: I lay experiencing the vague processes of my body .
chinese: 我躺着，感受到自己的身体正处在一种模糊的变化过程中。
模糊的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: Some dim impulse moved the policeman to look suspiciously at tom .
chinese: 一点模糊的冲动促使警察疑心地看着汤姆。

english: In a moment they had disappeared amid of the gloom of the lawn .
chinese: 片刻之间，他们已经在昏暗模糊的草坪上消失不见了。

english: She saw a faint mark on the horizon, and gradually it took shape .
chinese: 她瞥见天边出现了一个模糊的痕迹，慢慢形成可以辨认的形状。

english: He peered again, through the green hedge, at the two dark figures under the tree .
chinese: 他再扒开绿篱，注视树下那两个模糊的身影。

english: It had an outline in vagueness, and was flung out to be apprehended .
chinese: 在有了模糊的轮廓后，（她）把它顺嘴说出来，是让人领悟。

english: And yet there was but one woman of dubious and questionable memory to him .
chinese: 然而只有一个女人，还在他那模糊的成问题的记忆之中。

english: The origin of the laos states on the mekong is obscure and legendary .
chinese: 位于湄公河流域的老挝人各子国的起源，仅有一些模糊的传说。

english: These ideas, vague till then, took possession of their excited imaginations .
chinese: 这些在那之前一直模糊的念头现在却激发起他们的各种想象。

english: Prompted by some obscure motive he would lure his victims into this room .
chinese: 在某种模糊的动机的促使下，他把他的受害者们引诱到这间屋里。

english: By the time your father got down the hill, his brother was nothing but blood and pulp .
chinese: 等你爸爸来到山下，他叔叔已经是血肉模糊的一堆了。
